PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08232020-10-21,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Designating the Commission that is Named the Joint Public Inquiry into the Nova Scotia April 2020 Tragedy as a Department for the Purposes of that Act
PrecisOrder (1) designating the Commission named the JOINT PUBLIC INQUIRY INTO THE NOVA SCOTIA APRIL 2020 TRAGEDY as a department for the purposes of the FINANCIAL ADMINISTRATION ACT; and (2) designating the Prime Minister as the appropriate Minister with respect to the commission named JOINT PUBLIC INQUIRY INTO THE NOVA SCOTIA APRIL 2020 TRAGEDY.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Designating the Commission that is Named the Joint Public Inquiry into the Nova Scotia April 2020 Tragedy as a Department  for the Purposes of that Act
precis: Order (1) designating the Commission named the JOINT PUBLIC INQUIRY INTO THE NOVA SCOTIA APRIL 2020 TRAGEDY as a department for the purposes of the FINANCIAL ADMINISTRATION ACT; and (2) designating the Prime Minister as the appropriate Minister with respect to the commission named JOINT PUBLIC INQUIRY INTO THE NOVA SCOTIA APRIL 2020 TRAGEDY.
